profile.name: Rushikesh Karkhanis
profile.aboutme: I am Full Stack developer having more than 5.6 years for experience with technologies Java, Spring Boot , AWS, React.Passionate programmer willing to share knowledge and learn any new technologies to solve problems.
profile.technicalprofiencies: Java 8 and above, including Spring Boot, functional programming, data structures and algorithms (DSA), multithreading, design patterns, and Spring Data JPA. OAuth authentication. AWS services: Lambda, EC2, VPC, Auto Scaling, SQS, SNS, IAM, SES, and Kinesis.

workexprience.project: MPP - Maintenance Plan Portal is product which ensures the maintenance of the vehicle sold to customer.

roles_responsibilities.point1: Analysis, design and implementation of Maintenance Plan Portal
roles_responsibilities.point2: Design and Develop and Enhance services for MPP
roles_responsibilities.point3: Implemented Restful web services by using JAVA 8 and above, Spring Data JPA and Hibernate, AWS JAVA SDK.
roles_responsibilities.point4: Implemented UI for MPP by using React JS, and Redux toolkit for state- management.
roles_responsibilities.point5: Designed Database using ORM comfortable in relationship, mapping and inheritance in Spring data JPA.
roles_responsibilities.point6: Responsible to Performance improvement of apis and RESTful web services Non-blocking, reactive client to perform HTTP requests from Spring Boot and Completable Futures for java apis Developed Lambda for better processing of data to reduce time.
roles_responsibilities.point7: Used Gitlab for version control, to write ci/cd, integrated with AWS

workexprience.project: LMS - LMS remote care is a health care product which was designed to Designed and Developed LMS remote care according to client requirement.

roles_responsibilities.point1: Implemented Apache Kafka for multiple microservices communication
roles_responsibilities.point2: Used AWS java SDK specifically to integrated AWS Secret Manager and AWS S3 Bucket to store static assets (excel files, pdfs)
roles_responsibilities.point3: Used AWS SES service to provide notifications (alarms) to users accessing LMS products
roles_responsibilities.point4: Implemented UI for MPP by using React JS, and Redux toolkit for state- management.
roles_responsibilities.point5: Ensured the code coverage above 90 percent and passed all the quality gates
roles_responsibilities.point6: Familiar in writing JUnit Test cases for the services.

roles_responsibilities.point4: Involved in implementation of UI Components in monitoring micro service.
roles_responsibilities.point5: Involved in Unit Testing (Backend and Frontend).
